title: Taiwan's presidential election plays out in China's shadow
summary: For the three parties in the island's presidential and parliamentary elections on January 13, the threat of Chinese invasion has become the main topic of debate.

title: Ukrainian lawmakers call on the government to review its mobilization bill
summary: The country, engaged in war for nearly two years, is facing a shortage of new recruits and is finding it challenging to establish new recruitment rules.

summary: Amidst weeks of Yemeni rebel attacks on commercial ships in the Red Sea, the United States and the United Kingdom struck thirty Houthi military locations over 150 times according to US General Douglas Sims.

summary: Expanding the Sports and Olympic Games Minister's role to include national education and youth raises doubts about her ability to manage two major government priorities effectively, particularly with only six months until the opening ceremony.
